thread.section_title: Experience It Tours Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Experience It Tours | experienceittours.com
thread.title: Richard Feutz
thread.title_full: Experience It Tours reviewed by Richard Feutz

author: Richard Feutz
title: Richard Feutz
text:
We were 2 couples and used Experience It Tours for our 9 days in Morocco. I highly recommend this organization if you are planning to spend time touring the country. They custom built our tour so we could see and do what we wanted, no hard and fast timelines like so many tour operators.
Our driver was exceptional, local guides knowledgeable and friendly and our accommodations exceptional. This was the best value for the dollar we have experienced when using a tour service.
